body_html: That's because we do not track the binary to which we point the symlink too, so if you change the install of cuda, this will fail and needs a reconfigure. We are discussing how to do it correctly in the future already. FTR the same fix that the previous case is feasible (force a reconfiguration of the repo).

body: That's because we do not track the binary to which we point the symlink too, so if you change the install of cuda, this will fail and needs a reconfigure. We are discussing how to do it correctly in the future already. FTR the same fix that the previous case is feasible (force a reconfiguration of the repo).
